subject: [Agents] Expand CP subnav/routes/actions to Overview/Readiness/Discovery/Security
description:
Intent:
- Replace 2-view nav with 4-tab ops cockpit routes while keeping legacy aliases.

Assumptions:
- Subnav tabs are deep-linkable CP routes, not in-page tabs only.

Design + invariants:
- Keep , ,  backward-compatible.
- New tabs get dedicated actions and templates.

Diff plan:
- src/Plugin.php (getCpNavItem + registerCpRoutes)
- src/controllers/DashboardController.php (new actions + shared view models)

Verification:
- All tab URLs resolve and selected subnav state is correct.
